law.text: Any applicant or certificate holder who fails to provide the information required in KRS 224.1-310 or falsifies such information shall be liable for a civil penalty of not to exceed the sum of one thousand dollars ($1,000). The penalty shall be recoverable in an action brought in the name of the Commonwealth of Kentucky by the cabinet, or upon the secretary's request, by the Attorney General.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 384, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 360, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 399, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 289, sec. 3, effective June 19, 1976. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 6, effective June 21, 1974.
